titleStmt.title: Strange newes of the sad effects of the fatall eclipse happening the 29th of this March, 1652. Also a prediction of the future fate of the king of Scots: Likewise an old prophesie (never before extant) referring to the Prince of Conde (now in armes against the King of France) positively determining what will be the issue of the said Princes attempts. With the direful effects and prodigies (probably) to be expected in the aire on Monday 29 March, 1652. With other remarkable things never before published. / By N.R. Student in astrology.
titleStmt.author: N. R., student in astrology.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Harper at the Bible and Harpe in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 8"; The 2 in the imprint date is crossed out and "1652" written in.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
